name: BX1 - BX55
text:
Service Change  Posted: 11/16/2017  6:08PM

BX9 and BX39 buses are detoured in both directions because of paving on E 180 St between Bryant Av and Boston Rd.

Detours is as follows:

BX9 Southbound: Via Southern Blvd, remain on Southern Blvd to E Tremont Av, left on E Tremont Av and regular route into terminal.

BX9 Northbound: Via 180 St, left on Boston Rd, right on E Tremont Av, right on Southern Blvd and regular route.

 

BX36 Westbound: Via Boston Rd, remain on Boston Rd to Bronx Park South, left on Bronx Park South, left on Southern Blvd, right on 180 St and regular route.

BX36 Eastbound: Via 180 St, left on Southern Blvd, right on Bronx Park South, right on Boston Rd and regular route.

 



Planned Detour
Bx27 and Bx39 stops on Soundview Av/White Plains Rd between Gildersleeve Av and O'Brien Av
temporarily closed

Until further notice

Due to construction, please use the nearby temporary stop on Soundview Av at O'Brien Av.
